text: Pablo Cuevas and Horacio Zeballos were the defending champions, but they decided not to participate this year. Flavio Cipolla and Potito Starace won the tournament, defeating Facundo Bagnis and Sergio Galdós in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw XIII Venice Challenge Save Cup - Doubles 2015 Doubles
title: XIII Venice Challenge Save Cup – Doubles
